item.title: Fivecast Featured In Police Chief Magazine
item.description: Fivecast’s data analysis tool—Insight—was featured in Police Chief Magazine. You can download the full August edition of Police Chief Magazine here.

item.title: D2D CRC wins the Defence Teaming Centre ‘Growing & Emerging’ Award for Fivecast.
item.description: The Data to Decisions Cooperative Research Centre has received the ‘Growing & Emerging’ Award from the Defence Teaming Centre as part of the 2019 Annual DTC Defence Industry Dinner and Awards Ceremony. The award was received in recognition of the formation and growth of Fivecast. Brenton and Duane from the Fivecast team were on hand to receive the award in front of 665 people at the Adelaide Convention Centre.

item.title: Fivecast Discusses Expansion Plans With SmartCompany
item.description: Earlier this week Fivecast CEO, Dr Brenton Cooper, spoke to SmartCompany about the companies recent successful funding, future company growth, and international expansion plans. You can read the full article on SmartCompany.

item.title: Fivecast Secures VC Funding And Announces Its Expansion Into The US Market
item.description:
Fivecast has secured a $4 million investment round from Main Sequence Ventures’ CSIRO Innovation Fund and the South Australian Venture Capital Fund (SAVCF). This round will drive international expansion and product growth for the company’s key product line, Fivecast Insight.

An official press release is available for download here and further discussions about the investment and the companies expansion plans are available in a recent Australian Financial Review article.
